1.Summary: "Great Short-Term Job for College and High School Students"
1.Pros: I was able to work full time while attending college, with a flexible schedule. I was able to do this for 4 years.
1.Cons: The customers were rude, and I worked with some employees that were lazy. Sometimes it was hard to show progress when others would try to bring you down.

2.Pros: Good experience as a first job.They give you Flexible hoursGive you a free meal when you work.It's very easy to get hired.
2.Cons: Take away your raiseMake you do other people's jobs plus yours.Make you stay longer without consulting you when someone calls off.

3.Cons: They don't train you and they expect for you to understand everything quickly

4.Cons: they dont care about individual employees

5.Pros: Decent pay for fast food service.
5.Cons: Favoritism is rampant with the managers.

6.Pros: Good Opportunity for training new employees
6.Cons: Very difficult to keep up with all the orders
